events.message: I recently received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because this is not what I ordered.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect product shipment.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong product, and I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so I can verify and expedite the refund?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 12345ABC, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item.
We have reviewed your details and approve your refund request. You will receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks, Sarah. I appreciate the prompt support and look forward to the refund arriving soon.
The refund process has been initiated, and your case is considered resolved. Please contact us if you encounter any further issues.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory with your order.
Your refund has been completed and verified. We are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
